input.excerpt:
```index.R
word_count <- comma(sum(book_toks$value))

avg_words <- mean(book_toks$value)
<|editable_region_start|>

section_summary <- book_toks |>
  mutate(section = if_else(str_starts(heading, "Pro"), "Prologue", "Chapter")) |>
  group_by(section) |>
  summarize(
    total_words = sum(value),
    avg_words = <|user_cursor_is_here|>
  )

<|editable_region_end|>
book_toks |> 
  ggplot(aes(heading, value)) +
  geom_col(fill = "#82b777", colour = "#181d1e") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = avg_words, linetype = "dashed") +
  annotate("label", x = 15.5, y = avg_words, label = "Average") +
  labs(
    title = glue("Such an Odd Word to Use -- {word_count} Words"),
    x = NULL, y = "Words"
    ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

variables.name: book_toks
variables.value:
Columns:
* heading: chr
* value: int
* cum_toks: int

output:
<|editable_region_start|>

section_summary <- book_toks |>
  mutate(section = if_else(str_starts(heading, "Pro"), "Prologue", "Chapter")) |>
  group_by(section) |>
  summarize(
    total_words = sum(value),
    avg_words = mean(value)
  )

<|editable_region_end|>
